noun.name: sink
noun.discription: a basin with a faucet, used for washing hands, dishes, etc.

object1.name: bathtub
object1.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is a large, stationary container for holding water in which a person may wash their body

object2.name: toilet
object2.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is a plumbing fixture used for the disposal of human waste

object3.name: shower
object3.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is a place where water is sprayed onto the body to clean it

object4.name: dishwasher
object4.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is an appliance used to clean dishes and cookware automatically

object5.name: washing machine
object5.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is an appliance used to wash laundry

object6.name: faucet
object6.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is a device for regulating the release of water from a pipe or tap

object7.name: refrigerator
object7.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is an appliance used to store and preserve food at a cold temperature

object8.name: oven
object8.discription: in parallel with 'sink', is an appliance used for cooking food by baking or roasting
